title: Personalized Nutrition Recommendation System
summary: Extracted and structured nutritional data for 200 meals, built a recommendation algorithm using reinforcement learning (Q-learning) and evolutionary methods, and integrated preference feedback loops.

title: IMA 205 — Cardiac MRI Diagnosis (Kaggle)
summary: 1st place among 100 participants. Applied segmentation (U-Net, SegNet, SAM), ETL pipelines with PyRadiomics and trained ensembles (LightGBM, XGBoost) achieving 95% train and 81% validation accuracy.

title: Tick Tick Bloom — NASA/DrivenData Algal Bloom Detection
summary: Ranked 50/1377. Processed multi-band Sentinel-2 and Landsat imagery and optimized LightGBM with Optuna to achieve strong predictive performance.
